text: Ammuvinte Aangalamar is a 1996 Indian Malayalam film directed by Jaipal and starring Balachandra Menon and Chembakam in the lead roles. ==Cast== * Balachandra Menon * Chembakam (Shenbaga) ==References== ==External links== * Category:1996 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Ammuvinte Aangalamar
